headline: Heaven, Hell, Big Questions
abstract: TV’s two great moral comedies, both ending this week, showed us that doing the right thing in a fallen world is a group effort.
lead_paragraph: In the penultimate episode of “The Good Place,” after four seasons wandering the afterlife, our dear-departed heroes finally make it to the destination promised in the title. It is, of course, beautiful, with lush gardens and buildings with alabaster walls.
